text:
Can you please explain, how should I add priority/order field, what exactly do you mean by that?

Thank you very much for your answer.
Nice to know that I am not the only one :slightly_smiling_face: We can sob woeful tears together

<@U03NSHL85DZ> It would just be adding a number field inline in the blog detail page markup. This will allow the user to specify an number value (order) that you can then use to sort the posts on the blog listing page.
i'm not following this "...adding a number field in line..." what do you mean by this? Thanks!
Do you have any resources or examples? Thank you
Seem to be having the same error and not sure why. Any ideas?
